mapper.select: /* Adm_Authority.xml - getMemberAuthInfo */ SELECT MENU.IDX , MENU.MENU_NAME , MENU.MENU_URL , MENU.DEPTH , MENU.ORDER_NO , MENU.PARENT_IDX , MENU.ICON , MENU.IS_POP , MENU.IS_COMMING_SOON , MENU.MOBILE_YN , AUTH.EMP_NO , AUTH.IS_READ , AUTH.IS_INSERT , AUTH.IS_DELETE FROM rd_admin.tb_admin_menu_auth AUTH , rd_admin.tb_admin_menu MENU WHERE AUTH.MENU_IDX = MENU.IDX AND EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND IS_USE >= 1 ORDER BY MENU.DEPTH ASC, MENU.ORDER_NO ASC, MENU.PARENT_IDX ASC

/* Adm_Authority.xml - getMenuAuthInfo */ SELECT MENU.IDX , MENU.MENU_NAME , MENU.MENU_URL , MENU.DEPTH , MENU.ORDER_NO , MENU.PARENT_IDX , MENU.ICON , MENU.IS_POP , MENU.IS_COMMING_SOON , MENU.MOBILE_YN , AUTH.EMP_NO , AUTH.IS_READ , AUTH.IS_INSERT , AUTH.IS_DELETE FROM rd_admin.tb_admin_menu_auth AUTH , rd_admin.tb_admin_menu MENU WHERE AUTH.MENU_IDX = MENU.IDX AND MENU_IDX = #{menuIdx} AND IS_USE = 1 ORDER BY MENU.DEPTH ASC, MENU.ORDER_NO ASC, MENU.PARENT_IDX ASC
select count(*) as cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_menu_auth where lpad(emp_no,5,0) = #{empNo}
select count(*) as cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_test_account where lpad(emp_no,5,0) = #{empNo}
